WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: We are leaders in the distribution of mass consumer products, connecting manufacturers with supermarkets and stores in 5 countries. With a network of strategic warehouses, we ensure efficient supply and fast deliveries. Log in or register to manage your orders and optimize your operation.
PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: Password must be at least 4 characters
MANUFACTURER_REGISTRATION_DESCRIPTION: Complete the form to register on the platform and manage your products on CCP
MANUFACTURER_REPRESENTATIVE_NAME_PLACEHO: Enter the full name of the representative
MANUFACTURER_REPRESENTATIVE_NAME_MINLENG: The representative's name is too short.
MANUFACTURER_COMPANY_NAME_MINLENGTH: The company name is too short.
MANUFACTURER_COMPANY_ADDRESS_MINLENGTH: The company address is too short.
MANUFACTURER_EMAIL_INVALID: The email format is not valid.
MANUFACTURER_PHONE_INVALID: The phone number format is not valid.
MANUFACTURER_PHONE_MINLENGTH: The phone number is too short.
MANUFACTURER_COUNTRY_PLACEHOLDER: Select the company's country of operation
MANUFACTURER_COUNTRY_REQUIRED: The country of operation is required.
MANUFACTURER_COUNTRY_MINLENGTH: The country name is too short.
MANUFACTURER_RUC_PLACEHOLDER: Enter your tax ID or RUC
MANUFACTURER_RUC_REQUIRED: The tax ID or RUC is required.
MANUFACTURER_RUC_INVALID: The tax ID or RUC format is not valid.
MANUFACTURER_RUC_MINLENGTH: The tax ID or RUC is too short.
MANUFACTURER_CONFIRM_PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: The password confirmation is too short.
SELLER_REGISTRATION_DESCRIPTION: Complete the form to register as a seller on CCP
SELLER_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the full name of the seller
STARTER_PLAN_DESC: Allows selling up to 50 products per month.
GROWTH_PLAN_DESC: Includes analytics and allows up to 200 products.
PRO_PLAN_DESC: Unlimited product listings and premium support.
REGISTER_SUCCESS: Registration successful. Your account will be validated before operation.
REGISTER_ERROR: There was an error during registration. Please try again.
REGISTER_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your manufacturer account is under review. We’ll notify you once it’s approved.
REGISTER_ERROR_MESSAGE: There was a problem with your registration. Please try again later.
REDIRECTING_MESSAGE: You will be redirected to the home page shortly...
PENDING_VALIDATION_MESSAGE: Your account is pending validation. Please wait for approval.
PRODUCT_1_DESC: Bottle of pure water, perfect for daily hydration.
PRODUCT_3_DESC: Refreshing drink with classic cola flavor.
